description: This chicken curry is simple and full of flavour, making it the perfect midweek meal.
name: Easy Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 185 g Ayam Thai yellow curry paste

recipeInstructions.text: Add coconut milk and 1 cup of water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and cover and simmer for 25 minutes. Divide among serving bowls and serve.
Add coconut milk and 1 cup of water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and cover and simmer for 25 minutes. Divide among serving bowls and serve.
